WorkItem.ClosedComment: It's most likely because you have Haste procs off gear (rings, trinkets), enchants (engi, Black Magic) or talents (Lightning Reflexes).As Jothay said, without a character file you won't get a more specific answer.
WorkItem.Description: I have 318 haste in-game. 386 Haste in RAWR. I turned off all buffs.

Comments.Message:
Failed to follow the Posting Guidelines: http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=PostingGuidelines
* Spelled Rawr as RAWR, which is incorrect
* Did not post character file affected

Possible answer to question asked: http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=IDontUnderstandWhy&referringTitle=PostingGuidelines

Sorry, here's the Charater file. I didn't realize procs/enchants/talents added directly to Haste like that. I do have Hyperspeed Accelerators & Lightning Reflexes.
Confusing when in-game dosen't match Rawr. Would be nice to have a Haste dropdown showing actual haste and proc/enchant/talent haste.
